TRANSPARENCY_2A.text: Provide clear, accessible information about the AI system to affected persons.

HUMAN_OVERSIGHT_3B.text: Ensure effective human oversight for AI decisions, including escalation routes.

DATA_GOVERNANCE_1C.text: Maintain appropriate data governance, documentation and record-keeping including DPIA.

SAFEGUARDING_KCSIE.text: Act in line with KCSIE and safeguarding duties.
